skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: A worthy mount for Warrior Priests to spread Sigmar's divine lore far and wide.

skillTree.name: Volkmar's Disciple
skillTree.description: The enigmatic smile that appears on the Theogonist's face whenever Luthor's name is mentioned has led many to think that the old man knows something important about Luthor's ultimate destiny. None are known to be sure of the Grand Theogonist's motives, but whatever the case, this lone Warrior Priest of Sigmar continues his long holy crusade against the Darkness, fighting with nothing but his faith and the powerful swing of his mighty Warhammer.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Sigmar’s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Sigmar's Holy Justice
skillTree.description: Luthor has traveled the length and breath of the Empire, preaching against corruption and rousing the faithful to seek the will of holy Sigmar.

skillTree.name: Fiery Demagogue
skillTree.description: Many Priest suspected of corruption have been found slain by Luthor's feet, and the tales of such grisly acts of righteous justice meted out by his hands has drove an Arch Lector of the Church to demand for his immediate excommunication.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 when fighting against Greenskin Tribes, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen Warherds, Chaos and Norsca
Physical resistance: 15% when fighting against Greenskin Tribes, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen Warherds, Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Grand Shield of Faith
skillTree.description: The Warrior Priest’s faith manifests in the form of a shield as hard as castle-forged steel.

skillTree.name: Scourge of the Unfaithful
skillTree.description: Luthor is truly a living nightmare of every corrupt priest, the scourge of the unfaithful and the bane of those who consorted with the Dark Powers.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: +15% for all enemy spells
	(enemy armies in local province)

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Destroyer of Corruption
skillTree.description: Luthor Huss is a grim and determined figure of zeal, whose unwavering faith in Sigmar and his stern and almost emotionless expression has ensured the rooting of corruption whever he goes.

skillTree.name: Grand Soulfire
skillTree.description: A battle prayer that bathes the Warrior Priest in white, holy fire sears Sigmar’s foes but leaves the supplicant unharmed.

skillTree.name: Safeguard
skillTree.description: It is no easy task to bend or break the armour of this being.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Impassioned
skillTree.description: There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Conviction
skillTree.description: Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.

skillTree.name: Great Fervour
skillTree.description: This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
Weapon strength: +8% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
Weapon strength: +12% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Quicksilver
skillTree.description: Blink and you die.

skillTree.name: Chosen of Sigmar
skillTree.description: "To me, sons and daughters! Forget your pain! Forget your despair! A new power is among you! To me! This is what you have become!"

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Prophet of Sigmar
backgroundSkills.description: Luthor Huss, known by others as the Prophet of Sigmar is a legendary and zealously pious Warrior Priest of the Cult of Sigmar that has traveled the length and breath of the Empire, preaching against corruption and rousing the faithful to seek the will of holy Sigmar.
